++ Portal Based Computing

PBC is an interface strategy used by TheSystem to make usage as easy as possible.

++Implementation

[Portalling] is used extensively for [Frontend]s in [Applications]. [Conventional]ly these are known as:
    * Suites
    * Overview
    * Home pages
    * Dashboard
    * Control Panel
    * Panel
    * Homescreen
    * Main screen
    * Main menu
    * Help
